title: Russia’s top diplomat rejects key part of deal to end war with Ukraine
summary_full: Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov dismisses security guarantees demanded by Ukraine for any deal, once again saying the current regime in Kyiv should end.
summary_public: Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov dismisses security guarantees demanded by Ukraine for any deal, once again saying the current regime in Kyiv should end.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia’s top diplomat rejects key part of deal to end war

UA.evidence: Russia’s top diplomat rejects key part of deal to end war
